data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mitchell, John D., Daly, Douglas C. (2015): A revision of Spondias L. (Anacardiaceae) in the Neotropics. PhytoKeys 55: 1-92, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.55.8489, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.55.8489
